alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 17 at 2:47AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FIRST ACCUMULATING SNOW FOR THIS SEASON IN SOME AREAS... .Low pressure will enter the Ohio Valley Saturday before redeveloping near Cape Cod Saturday night. It will then move out to sea Sunday morning. The first plowable snow of the year is expected for many areas. The steadiest snow will fall Saturday night. ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Maine. portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
